summary: Encapsulates an iMOD‑WQ SEAWAT model, managing its identifier, optional validation mode, and the collection of model packages. Provides utilities for grouping packages, rendering configuration sections for flow and transport solvers, establishing time discretization, handling data clipping, caching, and optional cftime usage, and finally writing the complete model files to disk.
business_intent: Allow users to programmatically construct, validate, and export SEAWAT groundwater‑solutes simulations within the iMOD‑WQ framework.
